com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.roledetermination

Interface IRoleDeterminationFailureListener


  • public interface IRoleDeterminationFailureListener
    The HA role determination state machine uses an instance of this interface to report failures to the HA sub-system.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void failed(Throwable t)
      Handles a failure in the HA role determination state machine.
      void failedUnexpectedly(Throwable t)
      Handles an unexpected failure in the HA role determination state machine.

    • Method Detail

      • failed

        void failed(Throwable t)
        Handles a failure in the HA role determination state machine.

        This method is used by the state machine to report failures that happen in user-provided code or scripts (like a relinquishing-primary action for example), whereas unexpected failures are reported through method failedUnexpectedly(Throwable).

        The state machine is guaranted to be stopped at the time this method is invoked.
        Parameters:
        t - a Throwable representing the failure that must be handled

      • failedUnexpectedly

        void failedUnexpectedly(Throwable t)
        Handles an unexpected failure in the HA role determination state machine.

        This method is used by the state machine to report unexpected failures only, i.e. failures that are most probably the result of a bug, whereas failures due to user-provided code or scripts are reported through method failed(Throwable).

        The state machine is guaranted to be stopped at the time this method is invoked.
        Parameters:
        t - a Throwable representing the failure that must be handled
